name: Consumer Credit Reporting Agencies
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that provide credit-reporting services such as credit
investigation, credit clearinghouses, and other related services. This
MCC does not include collection agencies.
For merchants primarily engaged in collecting debts in default owed
to others or that were originally owed to others, use MCC 7322.
